ygData.subject: RE: mino horn
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The walls are still buggy, with the bonus of teleporting mobs (if you must meditate, sit in the *middle* of the room, or slavers will hit you through the
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 20 Oct 1999, Steven S. Klug wrote:
>
> So does that mean he doesn't charm anymore? That used to be a very buggy
> area where unsuspecting people could get charmed through the walls (without
> ever even seeing Meldrath at all). Then of course, he'd march you straight
> into his lair with the mino guards. Heh. Died 6 times trying to recover
> Laluni's corpse from there very shortly after release at about level 10.

The walls are still buggy, with the bonus of teleporting mobs
(if you must meditate, sit in the *middle* of the room, or
slavers will hit you through the wall and teleport in).
Meldrath didn't try to charm any of us. Do necros get charm?

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
